entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
